protein.specific_function: Calcium/calmodulin-dependent serine/threonine kinase which acts as a positive regulator of apoptosis

reference.reference_text: Deiss LP, Feinstein E, Berissi H, Cohen O, Kimchi A: Identification of a novel serine/threonine kinase and a novel 15-kD protein as potential mediators of the gamma interferon-induced cell death. Genes Dev. 1995 Jan 1;9(1):15-30.
